modules.name: Governance Visualization
modules.description: Framework for visualizing governance state, trust metrics, and health reporting

components.name: Governance State Visualizer
components.description: Visualizes the current state of governance components and their relationships

components.name: Trust Metrics Dashboard
components.description: Dashboard for visualizing trust metrics and trends

components.name: Governance Health Reporter
components.description: Reports on the health of governance components and identifies issues

components.name: Visualization Data Transformer
components.description: Transforms governance data into visualization-friendly formats

schemas.name: Governance Visualization Schema
schemas.description: Schema for governance visualization data structures

schemas.name: Trust Metrics Visualization Schema
schemas.description: Schema for trust metrics visualization data structures

schemas.name: Governance Health Report Schema
schemas.description: Schema for governance health report data structures

apis.name: Governance Visualization API
apis.description: API for accessing governance visualization data

apis.name: Visualization Integration Service
apis.description: Service for integrating visualization components with other governance modules

ui_components.name: Governance Dashboard
ui_components.description: Main dashboard UI component for governance visualization

ui_components.name: Trust Metrics Visualizer
ui_components.description: UI component for visualizing trust metrics

ui_components.name: Governance Health Reporter UI
ui_components.description: UI component for displaying governance health reports
